text:
Clustrix (www.clustrix.com), San Jose, Seattle, San Francisco is hiring engineers (multiple positions available in dev and QA)

Clustrix is solving one of the most difficult open problems in the software database industry today: scaling SQL. We've built our own distributed relational database from the ground up. Now we're looking for smart and motivated folks to join our small team of developers and take this technology to the next level.

No prior database is required, but you should be someone with experience in databases, file systems, or other systems at scale and comfortable with designing efficient programs in C.

http://www.clustrix.com/company/careers/openings/ H1-B welcome
